title: Apple Barrel Acrylic Paint in Assorted Colors (2 oz), 20513, Bright Yellow
description: Apple Barrel Acrylic Paint is the go-to crafter’s choice for projects big and small. Create fun and funky projects when you use this easy-to-use, high-quality paint. Apple Barrel Acrylic Paint is a must-have product for any crafter to have on hand for basecoating, stenciling, and more. Apple Barrel brushes on beautifully to wood, paper, canvas, Styrofoam, paper mache, and so much more. This creamy color glides on smoothly and dries quickly to all your crafts. Use this versatile paint with acrylic paint brushes, stamps, stencils, or sponges for an extraordinary finish. Enjoy excellent coverage on all your arts and crafts when you paint with Apple Barrel Acrylic Paint.
